author: Khaleda Rahman
title: Alabama Woman Hosted Party and Coughed in Officer's Face While Talking About Coronavirus, Police Say
description: Melanie Nicole Chambers, 39, was arrested after officers arrived at her home and found a party with up to 50 people in attendance, police said.
content:
An Alabama woman was arrested after she violated the state's stay-at-home order by throwing a party. The woman then coughed in an officer's face while speaking about coronavirus, police said.
Officers responded to a report about loud music on Brewton Street … [+4931 chars]
